# Project: Architect/Builder Company Website

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Tailwind CSS
- TypeScript
- React Icons

## Project Structure
- Static pages: Home, About, Services, Projects, Gallery, Contact
- WhatsApp integration for contact form
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Ready for Vercel deployment

## Development Guidelines
- Use App Router for all pages
- Keep components simple and reusable
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Static content only - no database needed
